name: They: A Cyberpunk Story
description:
Will you ever see the sunshine through the metal sky? 

Explore the effects of High Tech and Low life in this short cyberpunk story set in the world of Stolista (Mega Building One setting). 

They explores mental illnesses from a new perspective. What happens when technology reacts horribly to our bodies without anyone, even you, ever knowing? Instead of enhancing our experiences, it worsens; what then? Is it already too late?

This Twine game has 2 endings where it expands more on the story and character backgrounds. Choices in the game only affect the ending and character dialogue, not the story itself.

Content Warning: Strong Language, Violence, and Suggestive Themes.

Playtime: 16 - 20 minutes.
